head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths TREVES, GINO ROBERT

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths TREVES, GINO ROBERT

block.p: TREVES-Gino Robert. Born 1917, Turin, Italy. Died June 11, 2000 at age 83. Beloved husband of Clotilde Sonnino Treves. Loving father of George, Francis and Claire. Adored grandfather of Michael, Emma, Andrew and Aaron. Interment private, Beth El Cemetery. For further information, contact Frank E. Campbell, 212-288-3500
